components: SUSPENSION,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,EXTERIOR LIGHTING,STRUCTURE
summary: THE CONSUMER HEARD A LOUD NOISE AND FOUND LARGE AMOUNTS OF NUTS AND BOLTS ROLLING BACK AND FORTH ON BOTH PANELS IN THE TRUNK.  BOTH PANELS WERE REPLACED IN THE REAR SEAT AREA.  THE ENGINE STALLED, THERE WAS WHITE SMOKE COMING OUT OF THE EXHAUST BADLY.  THE CHAIN BOLT VALVE, TIMING COVER, TIMING BELT, TIMING CHAIN/BELT, THE BALANCE SHAFT BOLT, AND THE FRONT AND REAR STRUTS WERE REPLACED.  A NEW OIL PAN WAS PLACED IN THE VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE IDLED ABNORMALLY AND LOST POWER.  THE VEHICLE NEEDED A NEW BATTERY, AND A LEFT FRONT HEADLIGHT ASSEMBLY.  THERE WAS A KNOCKING ISSUE WHEN GOING OVER BUMPS.  MR  SCC   *JB
